GameConditionDef.label: Snow avalanche
GameConditionDef.description: An avalanche descended from one of the snowy mountains, which filled up one of the parts of the map.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An avalanche descended from one of the snowy mountains, which filled up one of the parts of the map.

GameConditionDef.label: Harvest season
GameConditionDef.description: The harvest season has begun. Plants will give more resources when harvested.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The harvest season has begun. Plants will give more resources when harvested.

GameConditionDef.label: Earthquake
GameConditionDef.description: An earthquake began, everyone in the shelter!
GameConditionDef.letterText: An earthquake began, everyone in the shelter!

GameConditionDef.label: Psy storm
GameConditionDef.description: A psychic storm has begun. This event marks a deterioration in mental well-being. Get your tinfoil hats ready.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A psychic storm has begun. This event marks a deterioration in mental well-being. Get your tinfoil hats ready.

GameConditionDef.label: Fog bomb
GameConditionDef.description: Somewhere not far from you, a strange device exploded, causing a flammable fog to spread.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Somewhere not far from you, a strange device exploded, causing a flammable fog to spread.

GameConditionDef.label: Ring world fall
GameConditionDef.description: Not far from the planet is a section of the ring world broken by an asteroid. Part of the skin and modules burns up in the atmosphere of the planet and falls to the ground along with fragments of the asteroid!
GameConditionDef.letterText: Not far from the planet is a section of the ring world broken by an asteroid. Part of the skin and modules burns up in the atmosphere of the planet and falls to the ground along with fragments of the asteroid!

GameConditionDef.label: Radioactive fallout
GameConditionDef.description: Heavy clouds spewing radioactive fallout accumulated in the atmosphere of these places. Should not appear on the surface for the next week.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Heavy clouds spewing radioactive fallout accumulated in the atmosphere of these places. Should not appear on the surface for the next week.

GameConditionDef.label: Extreme heat
GameConditionDef.description: Geysers have accumulated a huge amount of water in the bowels and now it splashes to the surface in the form of steam eruptions. This period is marked by an increase in temperature and humidity, as well as earthquakes.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Geysers have accumulated a huge amount of water in the bowels and now it splashes to the surface in the form of steam eruptions. This period is marked by an increase in temperature and humidity, as well as earthquakes.

GameConditionDef.label: Ice storm
GameConditionDef.description: An ice storm has begun. It carries incredible low temperatures and ice shards. The next time you should not go out.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An ice storm has begun. It carries incredible low temperatures and ice shards. The next time you should not go out.

GameConditionDef.label: Increased radiation levels
GameConditionDef.description: Fallout increases the overall level of radiation. Being on the street is life-threatening.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Fallout increases the overall level of radiation. Being on the street is life-threatening.

GameConditionDef.label: Heavy air
GameConditionDef.description: Air currents brought a large amount of heavy gases, they make it difficult to breathe and poison the body.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Air currents brought a large amount of heavy gases, they make it difficult to breathe and poison the body.
